body:
@fazalmajid You have `--with-ld=/usr/ccs/bin/ld` in your configure line, what happens with the more usual `--without-gnu-ld --with-ld=/usr/bin/ld`?

On recent Solaris/illumos releases they are the same file, however, maybe the executable inspects its own name and switches behavior based on that, let's eliminate that variable.
